summary: Comprehensive monthly event log aligned to Wikipedia 2025 coverage; includes politics, conflicts, climate, tech, sports, and culture milestones.

events.event: Israel intercepts the Global Sumud Flotilla , a fleet carrying
events.details: Israel intercepts the Global Sumud Flotilla , a fleet carrying humanitarian aid to the Gaza Strip , in international waters , arresting 443 activists from 47 countries

events.event: 4 – 2025 Czech parliamentary election : ANO leader and
events.details: 4 – 2025 Czech parliamentary election : ANO leader and former Prime Minister Andrej Babiš wins a plurality of seats, but fails to reach a majority

events.event: Dame Sarah Mullally is named the first female Archbishop of
events.details: Dame Sarah Mullally is named the first female Archbishop of Canterbury

events.event: Henri, Grand Duke of Luxembourg , abdicates the throne in
events.details: Henri, Grand Duke of Luxembourg , abdicates the throne in favor of his son Guillaume

events.event: Incumbent Prime Minister Petr Fiala 's coalition fails to win
events.details: Incumbent Prime Minister Petr Fiala 's coalition fails to win a majority

events.event: The 2025 Syrian parliamentary election is held, the first since
events.details: The 2025 Syrian parliamentary election is held, the first since the fall of the Assad regime in 2024

events.event: 11 – 2025 Seychellois general election : Incumbent President Wavel
events.details: 11 – 2025 Seychellois general election : Incumbent President Wavel Ramkalawan loses reelection to Patrick Herminie

events.event: 2025 Afghanistan–Pakistan conflict : Pakistan reportedly carries out airstrikes in
events.details: 2025 Afghanistan–Pakistan conflict : Pakistan reportedly carries out airstrikes in Kabul , Khost , Jalalabad , and Paktika , targeting Noor Wali Mehsud , an internationally designated terrorist

events.event: Israel and Hamas agree to the first phase of a
events.details: Israel and Hamas agree to the first phase of a Gaza peace deal , paving the way for a ceasefire, almost exactly two years after the conflict began

events.event: Ramkalawan's party LDS also loses its majority in parliament
events.details: Ramkalawan's party LDS also loses its majority in parliament

events.event: Dina Boluarte , the President of Peru , is unanimously
events.details: Dina Boluarte , the President of Peru , is unanimously impeached by the Congress of the Republic

events.event: 2025 Cameroonian presidential election : Incumbent President Paul Biya is
events.details: 2025 Cameroonian presidential election : Incumbent President Paul Biya is re-elected for an eighth consecutive term

events.event: 2025 Malagasy coup d'état : Following a series of protests
events.details: 2025 Malagasy coup d'état : Following a series of protests , incumbent President Andry Rajoelina is ousted and military officer Michael Randrianirina becomes President

events.event: Gaza war : Hamas releases the last 20 living hostages
events.details: Gaza war : Hamas releases the last 20 living hostages in Gaza after they were kidnapped during the 2023 October 7 attacks

events.event: In exchange, Israel releases 250 Palestinian prisoners and more than
events.details: In exchange, Israel releases 250 Palestinian prisoners and more than 1,700 detainees

events.event: 2025 Bolivian general election : Rodrigo Paz Pereira wins the
events.details: 2025 Bolivian general election : Rodrigo Paz Pereira wins the presidential election in a runoff against former President Jorge Quiroga

events.event: 2025 Louvre robbery : Pieces of the French Crown Jewels
events.details: 2025 Louvre robbery : Pieces of the French Crown Jewels are stolen during a robbery from the Galerie d'Apollon of the Louvre in Paris

events.event: Incumbent party MAS-IPSP loses all their seats in the Senate
events.details: Incumbent party MAS-IPSP loses all their seats in the Senate and all but two seats in the Chamber of Deputies

events.event: American Eric Lu wins the quinquennial XIX International Chopin Piano
events.details: American Eric Lu wins the quinquennial XIX International Chopin Piano Competition at the National Philharmonic in Warsaw , Poland

events.event: Sanae Takaichi becomes the first female Prime Minister of Japan
events.details: Sanae Takaichi becomes the first female Prime Minister of Japan

events.event: 2025 Irish presidential election : Independent candidate Catherine Connolly wins
events.details: 2025 Irish presidential election : Independent candidate Catherine Connolly wins the election in a landslide, defeating Fine Gael candidate Heather Humphreys

events.event: 2025 Argentine legislative election : Incumbent President Javier Milei 's
events.details: 2025 Argentine legislative election : Incumbent President Javier Milei 's party La Libertad Avanza wins the election with over 40% of the votes

events.event: Al-Fashir massacre : Mass murder is reported during which an
events.details: Al-Fashir massacre : Mass murder is reported during which an estimated 2,500 or more civilians have been executed by the Rapid Support Forces in the city of Al-Fashir , Sudan

events.event: Timor-Leste becomes the 11th member state of ASEAN , being
events.details: Timor-Leste becomes the 11th member state of ASEAN , being the first enlargement of ASEAN since Cambodia 's entry in 1999 and comprising all countries of Southeast Asia

events.event: Hurricane Melissa makes landfall into Jamaica as a Category 5
events.details: Hurricane Melissa makes landfall into Jamaica as a Category 5 hurricane , with wind speeds up to 185 mph (298 km/h)

events.event: Operation Containment : In Rio de Janeiro , more than
events.details: Operation Containment : In Rio de Janeiro , more than 120 people are killed in raids targeting criminal organization Comando Vermelho during the deadliest police operation in Brazilian history

events.event: 2025 Dutch general election : Social liberal party Democrats 66
events.details: 2025 Dutch general election : Social liberal party Democrats 66 ties with right-wing populist party Party for Freedom in most number of seats
